data.name: SuuubWaaay
data.detailed_description:
SuuubWaaay is a single-player strategic and stealthy horror game full of action and all kinds of horrors. You play as a detective investigating the closed but unsolved case of the SuuubWaaay incident in 1991 but you end up going a little too deep into the SuuubZone, a cold and dark place where the SuuubWaaay goes in and out of. Being able to go anywhere within minutes, SuuubWaaay was the most popular form of transportation! And within minutes, history changed forever. It's up to you to figure out what went wrong on that fateful day and come back to tell the story. Avenge the people on board that day.


THE SUUUBWAAAY
The SuuubWaaay was the most popular form of transportation! It looked like your average New York Subway, but it was waaay more! With the SuuubWaaay, you could go anywhere within minutes! Unfortunately, something went wrong one day, it arrived at the designated location damaged, and everyone on board was gone.

THE SUUUBZONE
The SuuubZone. This is where the SuuubWaaay goes into and comes out of, this is how the SuuubWaaay gets around. Designed by Sub Williams, the founder of the SuuubWaaay. Unfortunately, it malfunctioned one day and this is where you, and many others, are trapped inside.

THE CREATURES
Lurking in every shadow and corner of the SuuubZone are creatures. These creatures have inhabited the SuuubZone since the malfunction, now you must use the gadgets against these creatures that you may encounter.

THE GADGETS
Made by other people, designed to help people like you. There are multiple of these gadgets that you will find throughout the SuuubZone. Use these gadgets wisely though, the battery life isn't longer than 3 minutes usually. If the gadgets lose battery while next to a creature... may God be with you.

Use these gadgets wisely though, the battery life isn't longer than 3 minutes usually. If the gadgets lose battery while next to a creature... may God be with you.
data.short_description: Try to survive as long as you can in the SuuubZone, something is always watching you, and you should make sure you're always watching it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10-11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-5005U CPU @ 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10-11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4770K CPU @ 3.50GHz 3.50 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
